io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.spawn

Class StandardSpawnService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractService
      • io.janusproject.services.AbstractDependentService
        • io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.spawn.StandardSpawnService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, DependentService, SpawnService

    public class StandardSpawnService
extends AbstractDependentService
implements SpawnService
    Implementation of a spawning service that is based on the other services of the Janus platform.
    Version:
    2.0.1.0 2014-10-16 21:50:58
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  StandardSpawnService.CannotSpawnException
      This exception is thrown when an agent cannot be spawned.
      static class  StandardSpawnService.SpawnDisabledException
      This exception is thrown when the spawning service of agents is disabled.
      static class  StandardSpawnService.SpawnServiceStopException
      This exception is thrown when the spawning service is not running when the killing function on an agent is called.

      • getServiceDependencies

        public Collection<Class<? extends Service>> getServiceDependencies()
        Replies the services that must be launched BEFORE launching this service, and that must be stop AFTER stopping this service.

        If one of the dependencies is a AsyncStateService, this service will way until AsyncStateService.isReadyForOtherServices() is true.

        Specified by:
        getServiceDependencies in interface DependentService
        Overrides:
        getServiceDependencies in class AbstractDependentService
        Returns:
        the dependencies.
        See Also:
        DependentService.getServiceWeakDependencies()

      • spawn

        public UUID spawn(AgentContext parent,
         UUID agentID,
         Class<? extends Agent> agentClazz,
         Object... params)
        Spawn an agent of the given type, and pass the parameters to its initialization function.
        Specified by:
        spawn in interface SpawnService
        Parameters:
        parent - - the parent entity that is creating the agent.
        agentID - - the identifier of the agent to spawn. If null the identifier is randomly selected.
        agentClazz - - the type of the agent to spawn.
        params - - the list of the parameters to pass to the agent initialization function.
        Returns:
        the identifier of the agent, never null.
